
1) download and install vagrant and virtual box
2) download the file from here: https://cdn.ib5k.com/pointsinarea_v1.box
3) add the box:
   vagrant box add pointsinarea_v1 /path/to/pointsinarea_v1.box
4) cd into the pointsinarea checkout and run
   vagrant up
5) to login to the machine type:
   vagrant ssh
6) to start the service run:
   cd /vagrant && rails s
7) in your host machine point your browser to http://localhost:3000
   and the app will load ...
